title: Clear night city driving with frequent braking.
caption: The ego vehicle is driving slowly in a busy city street at night with frequent braking.
context: This clip is from ego vehicle index 1 in the CARLA simulation. Weather is clear (clearNight). The ego vehicle is moving slowly (average speed â‰ˆ 0.5 m/s). There are 25 braking events or strong decelerations in this window.
description: The ego vehicle is driving slowly on a busy city street at night. There are many other cars on the road, some of which are also braking frequently. The street is well-lit with streetlights and traffic lights. The weather is clear and visibility is good.
reasoning: The ego vehicle is driving slowly to ensure safety on the busy city street at night. It frequently brakes to avoid collisions with other cars on the road. The driver is being cautious and following traffic rules to ensure a safe journey.
